title: Miriam & Geo Learn Horayot 13: Hostile Takeover!
paragraph: Shalom, friends! DRAMATIC SHIT  is going down in the Beit Midrash - and there will be HURT FEELINGS! Backstabbing! Jealousy! Plots! Schemes! Unavoidable tangents into Kabbalah! Geo (@geopoor6416 )and I return for another unhinged chevruta session. Welcome to Miriam and Geo Learn Horayot 13: HOSTILE TAKEOVER

title: Miriam & Geo Learn Avodah Zarah 44: Donâ€™t Smite Me, Aphrodite!
MIRIAM & GEO LEARN AVODAH ZARAH 10: SALAD BASE
paragraph:
MIRIAM & GEO LEARN AVODAH ZARAH 10: SALAD BASE
Shalom friends,
Join me and Geo as we go on a VERY unexpected journey into the clandestine, salad-based situationship of a Roman emperor and Rabbi Yehuda Hanasi!?? We had no idea where this was going, and neither will you! (Unless...you guessed. Like Geo did.) Welcome to Avodah Zarah 10: Salad Base

title: The Maror Reactions Challenge
paragraph:
Shalom friends!
On #Passover, we eat maror, bitter herbs. In honor of the holiday and to pay homage to the iconic hot sauce-based interview series â€œHot Ones,â€ my study partner Geo brings 7 horseradish based varieties of maror, and a bunch of interview questions, to this video. Each maror is named after one of the seven levels of hell in #jewish mystical thought. Will I survive?? Will I be able to answer any of the questions? Or is this my personal Gehennom?? Find out in The Maror Reactions Challenge!

title: Miriam & Geo Learn Sanhedrin 67: The One with the GIANT FROG
paragraph:
Shalom, friends, 
We are going through a dark timeline. Come with me and my study partner Geo as we learn this Daf about magic, the Exodus story, and one really, really, really enormous Kaiju amphibian. Welcome to Sanhedrin 67: The One With The Giant Frog ğŸ¸ğŸª„#dafyomi #Chevruta #DafReactions

title: A Woman in An Act of Desperate Creativity: Chanaâ€™s Prayer Deep Dive with Rabbinic Intern Sass Brown
paragraph:
Shalom, friends! Welcome to â€œA Woman in An Act of Desperate Creativity: Chanaâ€™s Prayer Deep Dive with Ammud Rabbinic Intern Sass Brown.â€ In this chevruta session, Sass and I learn from the story of the prophet Chana as told in the Tanach, and the Talmud, to discover how Jewish prayer was shaped and defined by a woman. We also find some modern takeaways from Chanaâ€™s bold actions. 

About Ammud: Ammud exists to empower Jews of Color by providing community and personalized support to gather and learn, unchallenged in their Jewishness. They provide access to the Jewish education needed to be empowered members and leaders of the broader Jewish community, creating space to celebrate marginalized customs and traditions and (re)build culture.

Sefaria sourcesheet: www.sefaria.org/sheets/616541
#jewishlearning #tanach #torah
